P

pay(int) - Method in interface Trader
If amount is negative, an IllegalArgumentException must be thrown; if this owns enough money, deduct amount from money and return true, return false otherwise.
pay(int) - Method in class Wizard
If wizard is dead (isDead) no action can be taken and false is returned; if this owns enough money deduct amount from money and return true, return false otherwise
percentage - Variable in class AttackingSpell
Defines, if amount is interpreted as an absolute value or as a percentage.
percentage - Variable in class HealingSpell
Defines, if amount is interpreted as an absolute value or as a percentage.
possesses(Tradeable) - Method in interface Trader
If item is null an IllegalArgumentException must be thrown; returns true if this object possesses the item, false otherwise.
possesses(Tradeable) - Method in class Wizard
Return true, if the item is in the inventory, false otherwise

protectedFrom - Variable in class Wizard

provideMana(MagicLevel, int) - Method in class MagicItem
Always returns true; no Exceptions needed
provideMana(MagicLevel, int) - Method in interface MagicSource
levelNeeded==null or negative manaAmount must throw IllegalArgumentException; returns true if the object has at least the required level and can provide enough mana, false otherwise.
provideMana(MagicLevel, int) - Method in class Wizard
If wizard is dead (isDead) no action can be taken and false is returned: check if level is at least levelNeeded, return false otherwise; if MP is less than manaAmount return false; subtract manaAmount from MP and return true.
purchase(Trader, Trader) - Method in interface Tradeable
If seller or buyer is null or they are the same object, an IllegalArgumentException must be thrown;
